src:
Cinta Laura Dapat Penghargaan Artis Terbaik di Amerika
06 Nov 2019, 12:44 by Tempo.co, Istiqomatul Hayati
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Cinta Laura mengabarkan jika dia berhasil memenangkan penghargaan Best Actress dalam film horror berjudul Goodnight di ajang The 5th Official Latino Awards 2019. Cinta mengungkapkan rasa terima kasihnya kepada sutradara film tersebut, George E. Heras melalui akun Instagramnya. "Terima kasih untuk memilih saya sebagai aktris Anda di proyek ini!" tulis Cinta pada Selasa, 5 November 2019.
Perempuan 26 tahun ini juga memberikan selamat kepada George karena telah berhasil memenangkan kategori Best Horror Winner di judul film yang sama. "Terima kasih @officiallatino x @hbolatino karena telah memilih film kami sebagai Film Horor Terbaik! Selamat @thegeorgeheras atas pencapaian ini!" tulis Cinta.
Menurut dia, George telah bekerja keras dalam pembuatan film tersebut selama bertahun-tahun. "Anda telah bekerja sangat keras pada proyek ini selama bertahun-tahun dan kami semua sangat bangga dengan Anda!" tulis Cinta.
Sang sutradara juga memberikan selamat kepada Cinta melalui unggahannya di Instagram. "Selamat kepada @claurakiehl karena telah memenangkan Aktris Terbaik dalam The 5th Official Latino Awards 2019," tulis George pada Selasa, 5 November 2019.
Tidak hanya Cinta saja, namun pemeran wanita lainnya di dalam film tersebut juga mendapat apresiasi darinya. Menurutnya, mereka adalah wantia berbakat dan film tersebut tidak akan ada tanpa kehadiran mereka.Teriakan besar untuk semua pemeran wanita saya. Anda semua adalah individu berbakat yang cantik dan film ini tidak dapat dibuat tanpa Anda.
Netizen pun turut bangga dengan prestasi yang diperoleh oleh Cinta. Mereka juga mengucapkan selamat atas apa yang telah dicapainya saat ini. "Congrats! Semoga pertanda jadi bintang box office Hollywood!!! All the best qq," tulis akun @nadiafatimahh. "Selamat ya girl... Hebaat.. semoga karirnya tambah bersinar," tulis akun @premakomang. "Aku udah nonton filmnya, u're the best @claurakiehl congrates babeee, Indonesia bangga punya artis2 perempuan internasional.. Yg satu sukses dan jago di nyanyi @agnezmo yg satu sukses dan jago di film.. And that's you," tulis akun @dani.afrizy69.

MARVELA
text:
Love Laura Gets the Best Artist Award in America
06 Nov 2019, 12:44 by Tempo.co, Istiqomatul Hayati
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Cinta Laura reported that she won the Best Actress award in the horror film Goodnight at The 201 Official Latino Awards 2019. Cinta expressed her gratitude to the film's director, George E. Heras through her Instagram account. "Thank you for choosing me as your actress on this project!" write Love on Tuesday, November 5, 2019.
The 26-year-old woman also congratulated George on winning the Best Horror Winner in the same film title. "Thank you @officiallatino x @hbolatino for choosing our film as the Best Horror Film! Congratulations @thegeorgeheras for this achievement!" write love.
According to him, George has worked hard in making the film for years. "You have worked very hard on this project for years and we are all very proud of you!" write love.
The director also congratulated Cinta through her upload on Instagram. "Congratulations to @claurakiehl for winning the Best Actress at the 2019 Official Latino Awards," George wrote on Tuesday, November 5, 2019.
Not only love, but other female actors in the film also received appreciation from him. According to him, they are talented women and the film would not exist without their presence. A big shout for all my female actors. All of you are beautiful, talented individuals and this film cannot be made without you.
Netizens are also proud of the achievements obtained by Love. They also congratulated him on what he had achieved at this time. "Congrats! Hopefully the sign becomes a Hollywood box office star !!! All the best qq," wrote the account @ nadiafatimahh. "Congratulations, girl ... Hebaat ... hopefully his career will shine even more," wrote the account @premakomang. "I've watched the film, u're the best @claurakiehl congrates babeee, Indonesia is proud to have international female artists ... The one who is successful and is good at singing @agnezmo, the one who is successful and is good at movies ... And that's you," wrote the account @ dani.afrizy69.

MARVELA
